00027    class COStream : public Private::CNonCopyable
00028    {      
00029    public:
00030 
00034       inline
00035       COStream(CRequestWriter& writer)
00036        : mWriter(writer)
00037       {
00038          // NOOP
00039       }

00044       template<typename T>
00045       COStream& write(const T& value);

00050       COStream& write(bool b);
00051 
00055       COStream& write(const std::wstring& str);

00065       COStream& write(const void* data, size_t size);
00066

00068

00081 
00082 
00083    template<typename T>
00084    inline
00085    COStream& COStream::write( const T& value )
00086    {      
00087       if((2*sizeof(T)) < mWriter.avail() || setCapacity(mWriter.size() + (2*sizeof(T))))
00088       {         
00089          // align according to data type alignment requirements
00090          mWriter.pbump((-mWriter.size()/*=current offset*/) & (sizeof(T)/*=alignment*/ - 1));
00091 
00092          // copy data to the buffer
00093          *(T*)(mWriter.pptr()) = value ;
00094 
00095          // increase buffer size
00096          mWriter.pbump(sizeof(T));
00097       }
00098       
00099       return *this;
00100    }
00101 
00102 
00103    inline
00104    COStream& COStream::write(const void* data, size_t size)
00105    {
00106       if (size < mWriter.avail() || setCapacity( mWriter.size() + size ))
00107       {
00108          memcpy(mWriter.pptr(), data, size);
00109          mWriter.pbump(size);
00110       }
00111       
00112       return *this;
00113    }
00114 
00115 
00116    inline
00117    COStream& COStream::write(bool b)
00118    {
00119       return write(b ? 1 : 0);
00120    }
00121 
00122 
00123    inline
00124    COStream& COStream::write(const std::string& buf)
00125    {
00126       write((uint32_t)buf.size());
00127 
00128       if (0 != buf.size())
00129          (void)write(buf.data(), buf.size());
00130          
00131       return *this;
00132    }
00133 
00134 
00135    inline
00136    bool COStream::setCapacity(size_t newCapacity)
00137    {
00138       (void)mWriter.sbrk(newCapacity - mWriter.size());         
00139       return true;
00140    }

00146 DSI::COStream& operator<<(DSI::COStream& str, const std::string& s)

00148    return str.write(s);

00159 #define MAKE_DSI_SERIALIZING_OPERATOR(type)     \
00160    inline                                       \
00161    DSI::COStream& operator<<(DSI::COStream& str, type t) \
00162    {                                            \
00163       return str.write(t);                             \
00164    }

00181       
00182 template<typename T>      
00183 inline                                       
00184 DSI::COStream& operator<<(DSI::COStream& str, const T& t) 
00185 {     
00186    DSI_STATIC_ASSERT(std::tr1::is_enum<T>::value);
00187    
00188    return str.write((uint32_t)t);                                
00189 }

00192 #define DSI_VARIANT_SERIALIZATIONVISITOR(baseclass)            \
00193       class SerializationVisitor : public baseclass <>         \
00194       {                                                        \
00195       public:                                                  \
00196          explicit inline                                       \
00197          SerializationVisitor(DSI::COStream& os) : mOs(os) { } \
00198          template<typename T> inline                           \
00199          void operator()(const T& t) { mOs << t; }             \
00200          inline void operator()() { }                          \
00201       private:                                                 \
00202          DSI::COStream& mOs;                                   \
00203       }
00204

00208 
00209    namespace Private
00210    {
00211       DSI_VARIANT_SERIALIZATIONVISITOR(TStaticVisitor);      
00212       
00213    }   // namespace Private
00214    
00215 }   // namespace DSI

00217       
00218 template<typename TypelistT>
00219 inline
00220 DSI::COStream& operator<<(DSI::COStream& os, const DSI::TVariant<TypelistT>& var)
00221 {   
00222    int32_t typeId = var.getTypeId();
00223    os << typeId;
00224    
00225    DSI::Private::SerializationVisitor vst(os);
00226    DSI::staticVisit(vst, var);
00227    
00228    return os;   
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 template<typename T>
00233 inline
00234 DSI::COStream& operator<<(DSI::COStream& os, const std::vector<T>& v)
00235 {
00236    int32_t size = v.size();
00237    os << size;
00238    
00239    for(typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator iter = v.begin(); iter != v.end(); ++iter)
00240    {
00241       os << *iter;
00242    }
00243    
00244    return os;
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 template<typename KeyT, typename ValueT>
00249 inline
00250 DSI::COStream& operator<<(DSI::COStream& os, const std::map<KeyT, ValueT>& m)
00251 {
00252    int32_t size = m.size();
00253    os << size;
00254    
00255    for(typename std::map<KeyT, ValueT>::const_iterator iter = m.begin(); iter != m.end(); ++iter)
00256    {
00257       os << iter->first;
00258       os << iter->second;
00259    }   
00260    
00261    return os;
00262 }
